title: Log-in issues are still continuing?
body: I don't know if anyone else is still having issues. I checked the outage map, and all of Florida is covered. I click on League of Legends client, and it literally does not do anything. I can't open the game in general, so forget the log-in. I literally can't even open up the client. So, what's going on?

replies.body: i can log in it takes a while then says there was a problem and refers me to the log in troubleshooting page, i already checked my region, server is up, syncd the clock and all that stuff it tells u to do and i still can't log in
There was a live service incident that occurred around the time you posted this discussion. If you're still experiencing issues getting into League, let me know.
I always have disconnection problem while gaming. please reply how to solve problem.
